source_objects.title: Arts & Crafts
source_objects.description: From quilting to cake decorating, crafting inspiration to art instruction, welcome to the ultimate place for courses in arts & crafts.

items.title: How to Paint Boat Landscapes: Watercolor Essentials
items.headline: Learn to paint 8 different boat scenes!
objectives_summary: Essential watercolour techniques such as wet-in-wet and wet-in-dry
Simplifying any photograph into a loose drawing/painting
Paint various boat landscapes quickly and easily

items.title: Label your cosmetics/soaps the professional way.
items.headline: Learn what information that must be included on the front and back labels of your cosmetic product.
objectives_summary: Label your cosmetics
Free lavender essential oil cold process recipe with this course and box die cut vector file.

items.title: Painting bright light in watercolour
items.headline: How to paint sun with watercolours
objectives_summary: watercolour painting
different type of watercolour washes
understanding of tone values

items.title: Watercolour Elements in Asian Style
items.headline: Earth Fire Water & Air
objectives_summary: Watercolour Painting of the Elements

items.title: Learn to create Valentine’s Day special paintings
items.headline: Learn to paint 2 love inspired paintings with coffee and watercolor .
objectives_summary: Students will learn how to paint 2 Valentine’s Day themed paintings using coffee and watercolours

items.title: Draft a Basic Bodice Block Using Adobe Illustrator

visible_instructors.title: Ariana Bauer
visible_instructors.job_title: Sewing Teacher, Pattern Maker, and Designer
visible_instructors.name: Ariana

items.headline: No Adobe Illustrator experience needed!
objectives_summary: Learn how to get comfortable with the tools and user interface of Adobe Illustrator.
Learn how to draft a one and two dart bodice block.

items.title: Christmas In Moscow: Draw and Paint a First Snowfall
items.headline: Experience the magic of a first snowfall in Moscow by drawing and painting this scene together (Ink and Watercolor)!
objectives_summary: What materials you will need, and what pens work best for drawing and sketching.
How to plan your illustration and painting through understanding basic compositional elements and placement of objects, color and figures.
How to make simple, intuitive measurements to convert an photograph into an ink and watercolor illustration/painting.

How to Create a Simple Sketch

objectives_summary: Painting Waterfalls from Start to Finish

items.title: How to Make Slime : : Make Slime With Soap and Shampoo
items.headline: This course is a complete guideline to make slime with different methods
objectives_summary: How to make Slime? Slime making Methods Step by step
How to make basic slime?
Making Living Slime

items.headline: Mandala Border Design Online Course By Swamini Kulkarni
objectives_summary: You can draw any kind of Mandala Border Designs
Get rid of your Stressful Life
You can create your own designs of Mandala Borders

items.title: Learn Chinese Cursive Calligraphy with Poetry
items.headline: for students who want to write, recite and understand Chinese poetry
objectives_summary: Chinese Cursive Calligraphy

items.headline: Drawing & Art Course with sketches, Drawing for Beginners
objectives_summary: Figure drawing
Sketching
Simple way to Draw

items.title: Learn to Draw Villain Favorites - Perfect for Beginners

visible_instructors.title: Alex Mackey
visible_instructors.job_title: Founder of Watch Me Draw! and Watch Me Sculpt
visible_instructors.name: Alex

items.headline: Ursula, Dr. Facilier aka the Shadow Man, Hades, Captain Hook and Maleficent
objectives_summary: Learn to draw a complex drawing using basic shapes.
Increase fine motor skills and coordination.
Drawing is actually an acquired skill, not necessarily a talent.  Practice does indeed make perfect-ish.

items.title: Watercolor Painting Essentials: 8 Classic Venice Landscapes
items.headline: Learn line and wash watercolor painting with this comprehensive course.
objectives_summary: How to simply and paint 8 Venice landscapes from photographs
The correct use of values in painting
How to use color and complementary colors (warm and cool for striking effects)

items.title: Paint Vibrant Landscapes In Watercolor
items.headline: Learn how to paint four loose and vibrant landscapes!
objectives_summary: Sketching - how to reduce a photo or scene in front of you down to essentials and pick out elements and objects of focus.
Layering - learn how you only need 2-3 layers in order to complete a watercolor painting.
How to use colour effectively to create areas of interest of portray the mood of a scene.
